Convert Raw

Converts DB1B files from BTS/RITA/Transtats website raw data (prezipped file), for SKYNET's import function.

convert_raw(c, t, path = NULL)

Arguments

c

Coupon csv file to be processed
t

Ticket csv file to be processed
path

Path to save file to

Details

Coupon files can be found at https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=289. Ticket files can be found at https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=272. Both files should belong to the same year and same quarter. More information on variables to select and type of files to use can be found here

Examples

# NOT RUN {
temp <- tempdir()
convert_raw(skynet_example("Origin_and_Destination_Survey_DB1BCoupon_2001_1.csv"),
skynet_example("Origin_and_Destination_Survey_DB1BTicket_2001_1.csv"),
path = temp)

# }
